QuestData.Title: Restalaan, Captain of the Guard
QuestData.Description: They killed Aedraa and took the crystal from her! The captain of the guard, Restalaan, tried to stop them and they took him into the cathedral!$B$BIf we can just get this crystal, we can reunite the Heart of Auchindoun and turn its defenses on fully! We can't afford to fail now.$B$B$n, you're the only one left that can do it. You have to find Restalaan! He'll know where they took it.
QuestData.RewardText: There is no time for pleasantries. The raid's leader is just ahead.
